This is the home of Ubuntu Users in Nigeria.

Ubuntu Nigeria Team is a support team for Ubuntu Linux in Nigeria. The Nigerian team focuses on advocating, distributing, advertising, demonstrating and developing local attributes into Ubuntu within Nigeria. Through the advocacy and development of our projects we focus on the areas of schools, business and home users. Do tasks such as translating packages into local Nigeria languages, customized for the Nigerian culture. Solve any dude about Ubuntu Linux in Nigeria.
For CD's or technical support please contact any of the team members.
